title: Investigating Redundancy in Multimodal Large Language Models with Multiple Vision Encoders
what_happened: arXiv:2507.03262v3 Announce Type: replace-cross Abstract: Recent multimodal large language models (MLLMs) increasingly integrate multiple vision encoders to improve performance on various benchmarks, assuming that diverse pretraining objectives yield complementary visual signals.
